text: Galka () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Yayvinskoye Urban Settlement, Alexandrovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 1 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 8 km north-east from Yayva. == References == Category:Rural localities in Alexandrovsky District
title: Galka, Perm Krai
